categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Ovakar was a male Sith Lord of the resurgent Sith Empire living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY Ovakar resided inside Darth Vengean's Compound when Lord Draahg and another apprentice of Darth Baras stormed the compound, intending to kill Darth Vengean on their master's orders. Ovakar engaged the intruders, but was defeated.
